sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"友好的，亲切的"之意。
means: friendly ： 指举止像朋友一样，往往怀着满腔热情，乐意助人。
kind ： 指考虑周到，体谅他人，乐于助人。
cordial ： 较正式用词，指亲切热诚，情意真挚。

sentence.Network_en: The spokesman said the tone of the letter was very friendly.
sentence.Network_cn: 发言人说信函的语气非常友好。

sentence.Network_en: She was somewhat unapproachable but I'm sure she wanted to be friendly.
sentence.Network_cn: 她有些不好接近，但我确信她想表现得友好一些。

sentence.Network_en: Service was outstandingly friendly and efficient, falling down on only one detail.
sentence.Network_cn: 服务态度极佳，效率也蛮高，仅在一个小地方不尽人意。

用户友好(User Friendly) 是指用户可以比较容易地理解和记忆，而且资源名称越容易理解和记忆，也就是说它的用户友好程度就越好。

entry.tran: 友善的;友好的;好相处的
entry.def: If someone is friendly, they behave in a pleasant, kind way, and like to be with other people.

example.ex: Godfrey had been friendly to me.
example.tran: 戈弗雷一度对我很友善。

example.ex: ...a man with a pleasant, friendly face...

entry.def: If you are friendly with someone, you like each other and enjoy spending time together.

example.ex: Asmus became friendly with a number of writers and appeared in print as a literary critic.
example.tran: 阿斯穆斯和许多作家成为了好友，而且还作为一名文学评论家出现在报纸上。

entry.def: You can describe another country or their government as friendly when they have good relations with your own country rather than being an enemy.

example.ex: ...a worsening in relations between the two previously friendly countries.
example.tran: 这两个曾经友好的国家之间关系的恶化

entry.def: In sport, a friendly is a match which is not part of a competition, and is played for entertainment or practice, often without any serious effort to win.

example.ex: Athletic Bilbao agreed to play a friendly at Real Sociedad.
example.tran: 毕尔巴鄂竞技队同意在皇家社会队主场打一场友谊赛。

means.word_mean: 1. characteristic of or befitting a friend;
2. favorably disposed; not antagonistic or hostile;
4. of or belonging to your own country's forces or those of an ally;

sentences.sentence: "he was accidentally killed by friendly fire"

auth_sentence.content: It's customer friendly and it's animal friendly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's customer friendly and it's animal friendly.

auth_sentence.content: What with that and its pocket-friendly price, Grrr!
auth_sentence.res_content: What with that and its pocket-friendly price, Grrr!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What with that and its pocket-friendly price, Grrr!

auth_sentence.content: He is a very sociable man, very friendly.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is a very sociable man, very friendly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is a very sociable man, very friendly.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加
instant立即的;紧迫的+ly……地→adv.立即地,即刻地
like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
sufficient足够的+ly……地→adv.十分地,充分地
undoubted无疑的,确实的+ly……地→adv.无庸置疑地,的确地
unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地
uniform贯的,一致的+ly……地→adv.一律地,均一地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

Sentence.sentence: Most of the elderly people he interviewed said they had supportive and friendly dealings and got along well or very well with their sisters and brothers.
The ideal companion machine would not only look, feel, and sound friendly but would also be programmed to behave in an agreeable manner.
The ideal companion machine would not only look, feel, and sound friendly but would also be programmed to behave in an agreeable manner.

sentences.en: We're always sure of a friendly welcome at this hotel.
sentences.cn: 我们在这家宾馆总是受到友好的欢迎。

sentences.en: Our neighbours are friendly to us.
sentences.cn: 我们的邻居对我们很友好。

sentences.en: It was friendly of him to offer his help.
sentences.cn: 他提供帮助真是太好了。

sentences.en: They are on friendly terms with the boss.
sentences.cn: 他们与老板的关系融洽。

sentences.en: He is not friendly with anybody.

jushi.english: They are on friendly terms with the boss.
jushi.chinese: 他们与老板的关系融洽。

jushi.english: The friendly intercourse between our two countries can be traced back to the Ming Dynasty.
jushi.chinese: 我们两国之间的友好往来可以追溯到明朝。

jushi.english: Peter gave a pledge to handle the affair in a friendly manner.
jushi.chinese: 彼得保证以友好的方式处理此事。
